TopicTitle: High Contrast EZ to read Navball

Articles.Content: If you need an easier to read Navball you can find the two downloads and instructions for one in this thread. I'm also making a black white NASA style version I'll put it in the same place real soon now.
Ok the Black and White version is up. Looks real good and much easier to read...hopefully something like it will get included in the game even if you have young sharp eyes it's still better.
That looks fantastic to be honest
Finally! Something I've wanted for far too long.

Sounds awesome!

Pics please!

Also, if you could add a way to set the colors in an option file, that would be incredible.
this is nice but either delte this one and mess with it in the dev thread or move it to here imo
